DOC.detailed_description: Study Protocol The study protocol consist 2 condition : treatment condition ( A ) sham condition ( B ) . The order condition randomly assign either treatment sham first round vise versa second round balance cross-over design ( A-B-B-A ) four set measurement per patient . For treatment condition ( A ) , study consist three consecutive period 1 ) baseline period : 10 minute rest horizontal supine lie 2 ) intervention period : 10 minute rest head-down 30 degree supine lie 3 ) recovery period : return horizontal supine lie rest 10 minute . For Sham condition ( B ) , study perform similar procedure except intervention period consist horizontal supine lying . Hemodynamic ventilatory parameter record start period ( 0 min ) every 2 minute end period condition . Hemodynamic ventilatory dependent variable heart rate ( HR ) , systolic blood pressure ( SBP ) , diastolic blood pressure ( DBP ) , mean arterial pressure ( MAP ) , electrocardiography ( ECG ) , central venous pressure ( CVP ) , respiratory rate ( RR ) , oxygen saturation ( SpO2 ) , tidal volume ( VT ) , minute ventilation ( VE ) , dynamic lung compliance ( Cdyn ) end-tidal expiratory pressure CO2 ( PETCO2 ) . Subjects rested condition . Subjects suction via endotracheal tube clear airway 10 minute study commencement either A-B B-A .
